title: Unholy Union
description: Circumstance put Cristina on my path.Fate bound her to me.Cristina and I share a common past. A single night that changed the course of our lives.She asked me if I was a monster the night I met her.I am.She’s about to learn I’m her monster.Because the countdown that began eight years ago has ended. Her time is up.On the stroke of midnight, she’s mine.Unholy Union contains the prologue Unholy: The Beginning
author: Natasha Knight
